title: Is Elizabeth Warren Right About Private Equity?
description: Presidential candidate Elizabeth Warren blames private equity for many of the issues in our economy. She plans to reign it in and regulate it with her new bill the "Stop Wall Street Looting Act". On this episode, Kate and Luigi explain how private equity really works, whether it’s bad or good for society, and they dissect Warren’s proposal to regulate these firms.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (University of Chicago Podcast Network)
